participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Outgoing and playful, enjoys modern culture and finds joy in simple pleasures.
participant_1.background: I'm looking forward to moving on to the next chapter in my life. I enjoy taking my dog to the farmers market on the weekends. I play video games all day. I have never been in a relationship because I prefer to spend my time with my cars. I feel like my heart is beating in time with the rain.

participant_2.name: Emma
participant_2.personality: Compassionate and thoughtful, deeply cares about others and is reflective about her experiences.
participant_2.background: My worst moment was losing a patient in my arms. I do not like wearing a swimsuit. I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love. I am not sure what my family members do for a living. I like to sleep in, but my favorite time of day is sunset.

content.text: I am most afraid of losing my passion for things I love.
Oh that is too bad. What are some of the things you love?
I really love my job as a doctor. It is so rewarding to be able to help people.
That is awesome! I am glad you enjoy your job.
What is your favorite thing to do?
I love playing video games. I am really into the new Call of Duty game.
I have never played that game before. I am not really a gamer.
That is okay. I have been playing video games since I was a kid.
What is your favorite game of all time?
I would have to say that it is Super Mario World. That was my first video game and I loved it.
Oh I have heard of that game. I have never played it though.
You should try it sometime. It is really fun.
Okay I will check it out.
